directions: Pour the cream into a mixing bowl
Whisk the cream until it becomes whipped cream
Continue whisking until the whipped cream thickens and separates into butter and buttermilk
Pour off the buttermilk and save for another use
Place the butter in a clean kitchen towel and squeeze out any remaining liquid
Add salt to taste and mix well
Shape the butter into a stick or a desired form
Refrigerate until firm and ready to use
